name: Tongued
description:
Tongued is a fast-paced online multiplayer game where you play as a chameleon and compete with your friends.  

The game is centered around its main mechanic, tongue-swinging. Use your tongue to move, grabbing onto the terrain and using  gravity to gain momentum or catching your friends to sabotage them. The game is easy to grab, hard to master, and lets you express yourself and perform amazing manoeuvres and acrobatics with its core mechanics. 

The main game mode is a free for all where you fight for the posession of the gem, which could be blessed or cursed depending on the will of the gods (aka the current round). Keep the gem while blessed, and get rid of it as soon as you can while cursed!

Use you tongue, lick your friends and have fun!
